excerpt.rendered: With a rafting and Via Ferrata package, you can spend half the day rafting one of Colorado’s best rivers and the other half climbing high into the Rocky Mountains. This full-day experience allows you to choose from class II floats to class V rapids while ensuring an adrenaline rush on our Via Ferrata course. Spend your day exploring the Arkansas River Valley in Buena Vista, or join us for an action-packed day on Clear Creek and high above the Front Range at our Idaho Springs outpost.
